p: Studies reported that the microparticles (MPs) with aerodynamic size between 1 and 5 μm could escape the mucociliary clearance and deposit in the lower airways. This aerodynamic size range is mainly using in several commercial inhalation products [ 61]. Ribavirin, Zanamivir, Laninamivir, Interferon-α2 are currently available inhaled anti-viral agents against the human respiratory viruses RSV, rhinovirus, influenza A and B, parainfluenza, adenovirus and coronavirus [ 62].
